title: The Art of Iyapan
description:
Japanese artist 40hara (pronounced “Shimahara”) has created an incredible achievement in his “Iyapan” doujinshi line, or I Want You to Make a Disgusted Face and Show Me Your Underwear, which featured gorgeous girls showing you their panties while looking at you with an expression of loathing that you’d ask to see their underwear.

(Note: Mangadex is  following the original release doujinshi order, below is Official English order)
[spoiler][img]https://ahegao.b-cdn.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/The-Art-of-Iyapan-English-Edition-0003.jpg[/img][/spoiler]

related.title: Iya na Kao Sarenagara Opantsu Misete Moraitai Manga
